languages.text: {n}Во взгляде Владайма читается легкое недоверие.{/n} "Подобное милосердие — редкость в Просторе Коронус. Даже такие могущественные персоны, как Вольные Торговцы, демонстрируют его нечасто. Благодарю, Ваша Светлость".

{n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Во взгляде Владайма читается легкое недоверие.{/n} "Подобное милосердие — редкость в Просторе Коронус. Даже такие могущественные персоны, как Вольные Торговцы, демонстрируют его нечасто. Благодарю, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは、少し不信感を滲ませた目でこちらを見る。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスでそういった慈善活動はそうそうない。自由開拓者ほど影響力の人物でも、滅多にやるものじゃない。ありがとう、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは、少し不信感を滲ませた目でこちらを見る。{/n}「コロヌス・エクスパンスでそういった慈善活動はそうそうない。自由開拓者ほど影響力の人物でも、滅多にやるものじゃない。ありがとう、陛下」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆的目光略带怀疑。{/n}“这样的善举在科罗努斯扩区实属罕见。哪怕是像行商浪人这样有权有势的大人物，也不会时常表现出如此慷慨。谢谢您，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆的目光略带怀疑。{/n}“这样的善举在科罗努斯扩区实属罕见。哪怕是像行商浪人这样有权有势的大人物，也不会时常表现出如此慷慨。谢谢您，大人。”

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Vladaym no parece confiar en ti del todo.{/n} «No se ve tal generosidad a menudo en la Extensión de Koronus. Ni siquiera de figuras tan importantes como los Comerciantes Independientes. Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Vladaym no parece confiar en ti del todo.{/n} «No se ve tal generosidad a menudo en la Extensión de Koronus. Ni siquiera de figuras tan importantes como los Comerciantes Independientes. Gracias, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym semble légèrement soupçonneux.{/n} « On voit rarement une charité pareille dans les Étendues de Koronus, même chez des individus aussi puissants que les libres-marchands. Merci, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym semble légèrement soupçonneux.{/n} « On voit rarement une charité pareille dans les Étendues de Koronus, même chez des individus aussi puissants que les libres-marchands. Merci, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Vladayms Blick ist leicht misstrauisch.{/n} "So viel Wohltätigkeit ist eine Seltenheit in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Selbst so mächtige Personen wie Freihändler zeigen sie nicht häufig. Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladayms Blick ist leicht misstrauisch.{/n} "So viel Wohltätigkeit ist eine Seltenheit in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Selbst so mächtige Personen wie Freihändler zeigen sie nicht häufig. Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın bakışlarında hafif bir şüphecilik oluşuyor.{/n} "Böylesi bir hayırseverlik, Koronus Enginliği'nde ender görülür. Hatta Hür Tacirler gibi güçlü figürler arasında dahi. Müteşekkirim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's gaze is slightly distrustful.{/n} "Such charity is a rare sight in the Koronus Expanse. Even figures as powerful as Rogue Traders do not show it often. Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym şüphelenmiyor değil.{/n} "Böylesi bir hayırseverlik Koronus Enginliği'nde Hür Tacirler kadar güçlü figürler arasında dahi ender görülür. Müteşekkirim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
